title: United States Military Academy
summary: The United States Military Academy (USMA), also known as West Point, Army, Army West Point,[7] The Academy, or simply The Point, is a four-year federal service academy in West Point, New York. It was originally established as a fort, as it sits on strategic high ground overlooking the Hudson River with a scenic view, 50 miles (80Â km) north of New York City. It is the oldest of the five American service academies and educates cadets for commissioning into the United States Army.
